intervals.name: Warmup
intervals.description: Take a few seconds to get focused and ready.

intervals.name: Sprint
intervals.description: Run as fast as possible for 30 seconds.

intervals.name: Walk/Rest
intervals.description: Walk at a brisk pace and use this time to rest.

intervals.name: Run
intervals.description: Run at a fast pace you can hold for 4 minutes.

intervals.name: Warmup
intervals.description: Take a few seconds to get focused and ready.

intervals.name: Jabs
intervals.description: While in a boxing stance, continuosly shoot jabs with your non dominant hand.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Crosses
intervals.description: While in a boxing stance, continuosly shoot crosses with your dominant hand.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Hook and Weave
intervals.description: While in a boxing stance, continuosly shoot jabs with your non dominant hand.

intervals.name: Warmup
intervals.description: Take a few seconds to get focused and ready.

intervals.name: Squats
intervals.description: Perform as many bodyweight squats as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Pushups
intervals.description: Perform as many pushups as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Lunges
intervals.description: Perform as many bodyweight lunges (on both legs) as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Ab Crunches
intervals.description: Perform as many crunches as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Side-to-side hops
intervals.description: Hop from side to side with both legs

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Close grip pushups
intervals.description: With your hands in the shape of a diamond (or just very close together), perform as many pushups as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest: rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Jumping jacks
intervals.description: Peform as many jumping jacks as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest: rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Burpees
intervals.description: Perform as many burpees as possible.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Rest: rest for the alotted time, remember to take deep breaths.

intervals.name: Round 1
intervals.description: Square up and spar with a partner.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Take a minute to rest and catch your breath.

intervals.name: Round 2
intervals.description: Square up and spar with a partner.

intervals.name: Rest
intervals.description: Take a minute to rest and catch your breath.

intervals.name: Round 3
intervals.description: Square up and spar with a partner.
